forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: chat lag test #2

comments.text: Hi all! Yesterday's v149 tested if getting rid of voice smoothing would also get rid of the voice lag some of you had. We're still waiting for more feedback on that.
Today's version 150 (you're on [version]) rolls it back to voice smoothing, but we're using 1s of smoothing instead of the previous, post-September 2s.
Pls let us know how today's version goes, both in terms of potential lag, as well as potential choppy crk-style voice cut offs, thank you!
And v150.2: We fixed the back of the main dialog in desktop mode showing the wrong colors and overlaying the time!

thread.latestCommentText: And v150.2: We fixed the back of the main dialog in desktop mode showing the wrong colors and overlaying the time!
